placeholder.heading: Revenue bonds, notes, or other obligations; loans and grants.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 116 of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 3 of NCRC and AWC Debt Acquisition Delegation Authority Emergency Amendment Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16- 405, June 26, 2006, 53 DCR 5417).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 15-219, see notes following § 2-1223.01.

Law 16-162, the "NRCR and AWC Debt Acquisition Delegation Authority Amendment Act of 2006", was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-655 which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 2, 2006, and June 6, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 26, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-403 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-162 became effective on September 19, 2006.
